scripts.build:all: npm run zip:source && npm run build:firefox && npm run build:chrome
scripts.build:chrome:old: rm -rf dist && vite build && npm run zip:chrome
scripts.build:chrome:sushi: rm -rf dist && MODE=sushi vite build && cd dist && zip -r ../dist-chrome-sushi.zip .
scripts.build:chrome:atlas: rm -rf dist && MODE=atlas vite build && cd dist && zip -r ../dist-chrome-atlas.zip .
scripts.build:chrome:focus: rm -rf dist && MODE=focus vite build && cd dist && zip -r ../dist-chrome-focus.zip .
scripts.build:chrome:popcorn: rm -rf dist && MODE=popcorn vite build && cd dist && zip -r ../dist-chrome-popcorn.zip .
scripts.build:chrome:vex: rm -rf dist && MODE=vex vite build && cd dist && zip -r ../dist-chrome-vex.zip .
scripts.build:chrome:chrry: rm -rf dist && MODE=chrryAI vite build && cd dist && zip -r ../dist-chrome-chrry.zip .
scripts.build:chrome:zarathustra: rm -rf dist && MODE=zarathustra vite build && cd dist && zip -r ../dist-chrome-zarathustra.zip .
scripts.build:chrome:search: rm -rf dist && MODE=search vite build && cd dist && zip -r ../dist-chrome-search.zip .
scripts.build:chrome:grape: rm -rf dist && MODE=grape vite build && cd dist && zip -r ../dist-chrome-grape.zip .
scripts.build:chrome:burn: rm -rf dist && MODE=burn vite build && node scripts/validate-manifest-v3.js && cd dist && zip -r ../dist-chrome-burn.zip .
scripts.build:chrome:vault: rm -rf dist && MODE=vault vite build && cd dist && zip -r ../dist-chrome-vault.zip .
scripts.build:chrome:pear: rm -rf dist && MODE=pear vite build && cd dist && zip -r ../dist-chrome-pear.zip .
scripts.build:chrome: npm run build:chrome:sushi && npm run build:chrome:atlas && npm run build:chrome:focus && npm run build:chrome:vex && npm run build:chrome:popcorn && npm run build:chrome:chrry && npm run build:chrome:zarathustra && npm run build:chrome:search && npm run build:chrome:grape && npm run build:chrome:burn && npm run build:chrome:vault && npm run build:chrome:pear
scripts.build:chrome:dev: rm -rf dist && tsc && vite build --mode development && npm run zip:chrome
scripts.build:firefox: npm run zip:source && rm -rf dist && tsc && VITE_BROWSER=firefox vite build && npm run zip:firefox
scripts.reload:watch: chokidar "dist/**/*" -c "echo Extension updated - please refresh in Chrome"
